mining.WhatUltrainMinerDec: The operation of Ultrain permitted net requires miners to dedicate their computing power, where as miners can gain UGAS rewards.
mining.HowToBeMinerStepOne: Step one:  Purchase Ultrain’ s Mining Rig
mining.HowToBeMinerStepOneDec: Current Miners are being sold through different stages, please pay attention to all related notice on our platform.
mining.HowToBeMinerStepTwoDec: Can purchase UGAS on exchange, such as Huobi, Bgogo, QB.COM.
mining.Name: Name
mining.Detail: After your submission, Ultrian’s official staff will be in contact with you for detail infor. Client Manager(Wechat):Beata_zzzz.
mining.addressDaily: UGAS will be paid into the ETH address next day
mining.PleaseContact: Please contact customer manager through WeChat contact:
mining.tokenLocked: The staked token is locked into Miner’s account and can be withdraw by miner once stake contract date expires or miner gives up their right to mine
mining.WorryOwning: · Worry free approach to owning a mining rig, no financial burden of rig operation and storage.
mining.NeedsIDC: · Needs IDC access for mining rig, rig utilizes 200KWh of electricity
mining.PhysicalMining: · Physical mining rigs allow shutting down and turning on at ease

wallet.walletBackupTips: Please use your backup private key and mnemonic phrase for access when you delete wallet or uninstall Ultrain APP. Not backing up your data can lead to lose of data & asset.
wallet.walletBackupLi1: 1.Please make sure you are in a secure environment under no surveillance for security purpose.
wallet.walletBackupLi2: 2.Please do not screenshot to prevent leakage of sensitive information for security purpose.
wallet.walletBackupLi3: 3.We recommend you write down backup Infor, keep a paper trail and locate such record in a secure place.
wallet.backupTips: Please backup wallet on a timely bases.  Backup key and mnemonic phase can be used to access wallet in case of deleted wallet or uninstalled app
wallet.loseTips: If you lose private key for any reason, please contact Ultrain official telegram for communication
wallet.notBeSame: The new password and the current password cannot be the same
wallet.bundledPerLess5: Each account could hold five wallets and not support to unbind now.
wallet.pleaseCopyMnemonicPhrase: Please copy private key and mnemonic phrase !
wallet.walletBackupRequiredTips: Please use your backup private key and mnemonic phrase for access when you delete wallet or uninstall Ultrain APP. Not backing up your data can lead to lose of data.
wallet.resetPasswordTips: Wallet password is used to protect the private key to your wallet, and transaction verification
wallet.notStoreKey: Ultrain will not store the private key for you which is stored locally on the app.
backupsList: Lost assets in your wallet if backups are lost.
The private key will be lost after the App is uninstalled and will not be backed up.
Please backup your private key in the device where you create the wallet.
wallet.finishWalletAccount: Please finish creating your wallet account
wallet.tipsTitle: New key information has been generated!
wallet.tipsDec: It is recommended to back up the wallet immediately. After deleting the wallet or uninstalling the app, the wallet needs to be recovered through the backup private key or mnemonic words. Failure to do so in time may result in asset loss
wallet.importTips: The system has detected that you have replaced the device. Please use the original device to export the private key and mnemonics and import the new device again
wallet.noKeyTips: There is no private key or mnemonic in this wallet. Please import and try again
wallet.linkWalletTips: Failed to link wallet information, please contact the administrator
wallet.balanceInsufficient: Reset private key requires 2.4 UGAS, account balance is insufficient
wallet.pleaseWait: This process may last for 20-30 seconds, please wait
